text: “Malaa, goe haga modongoohia ina gi digau Israel nnelekai aanei ala e wanga ko Au go Tagi go Yihowah gi digaula: Di mee dela gaa hai ko Au hagalee bolo adu gi goodou, go digau Israel, gei di mee hua anga gi dogu ingoo dabu, dela ne haga haga langaadia go goodou i nia guongo huogodoo ala ne hula ginai goodou.
